mapper.update: UPDATE comment_tb SET content = #{content} /* 내용 */ , modify_date = SYSDATE /* 수정일 */ WHERE comment_uid = #{comment_uid} /* 댓글 번호 */ AND user_uid = #{user_uid} /* 작성자 */ AND deleteyn = 'N'
UPDATE comment_tb SET deleteyn = 'Y' /* 삭제 여부 */ , modify_date = SYSDATE /* 수정일 */ WHERE comment_uid = #{comment_uid} /* 댓글 번호 */ AND user_uid = #{user_uid} /* 작성자 */ AND deleteyn = 'N'
mapper.select: SELECT comment_uid , TO_CHAR(content) AS content , write_date , modify_date , depth , deleteyn , parent_comment_uid , user_uid , post_uid FROM comment_tb WHERE comment_uid = #{comment_uid} AND deleteyn = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_tb WHERE parent_comment_uid = #{comment_uid} AND deleteyn = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_tb WHERE post_uid = #{post_uid} AND deleteyn = 'N'

SELECT C.comment_uid AS COMMENT_UID , C.parent_comment_uid AS PARENT_COMMENT_UID , C.depth AS DEPTH , U.username AS USERNAME , U.user_uid AS USER_UID , TO_CHAR(C.write_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS WRITE_DATE , C.deleteyn AS DELETEYN , CASE WHEN C.deleteyn = 'Y' THEN '삭제된 댓글입니다.' ELSE TO_CHAR(C.content) END AS CONTENT FROM comment_tb C JOIN user_tb U ON C.user_uid = U.user_uid WHERE C.post_uid = #{post_uid} ORDER BY C.comment_uid
